鷕鷕鷕

鷕字的基本解释

鷕
yǎo
雌雉的叫声：“雉鷕鷕而朝鴝”。

鷕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎo］
［《廣韻》以沼切，上小，以。］
(1)野鸡鸣声。
(2)泛指禽鸟叫声。
(3)叹息，慨叹。参见“鷕氣”、“鷕鷕”。
[②]［xiào］
［《集韻》胡了切，上筱，匣。］
野鸡。

鷕字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鷕； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1499第01
【唐韻】以沼切【集韻】【韻會】以紹切，?音溔。【說文】雌雉鳴也。【詩·邶風】有鷕雉鳴。【潘岳·射雉賦】麥漸漸以擢芒，雉鷕鷕而朝雊。又【廣韻】羊水切【集韻】愈水切，?音唯。義同。【詩·邶風·陸德明音義】又以水反。又【集韻】【正韻】?伊鳥切，音杳。又【集韻】胡了切，音皛。義?同。

鷕字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鷕字的起名意思

暂无。

cry of hen pheasant
Basic explanation of words
cry of hen pheasant
yǎo
The female's pheasant's call: "The pheasant greets and faces the pheasant".
cry of hen pheasant
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǎo］
["Guangyun" cut by marsh, upper small, with. ]
(1) Pheasant singing.
(2) Generally refers to the calls of birds.
(3) Sigh, sigh. See "sniff", "sniff".
[②]［xiào］
["Ji Yun" Hu cut, Shang Xiao, Xia. ]
pheasant.
cry of hen pheasant
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鷕; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1499 No. 01
[Tang Yun] cut with marsh [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] cut with Shao,? Yin Ming. [Said the text] The female pheasant also calls. 【Poetry·Bei Feng】There are pheasant sounds. 【Pan Yue·Shooting the Pheasant Fu】Mai gradually turned towards the pheasant with the help of the sacred mans and the pheasant. Also [Guang Yun] Amniotic fluid cut [Ji Yun] more water cut,? Sound only. The same meaning. 【Poetry·Bei Feng·Lu Deming Sound and Meaning】reversed with water. Also 【Ji Yun】【Zheng Yun】? Yi Niao cut, the sound is depressed. [Ji Yun] Hu cut, Yin Zhu. Righteous? Same.
cry of hen pheasant
